name: Golden Tee LIVE 2012
overview:
Golden TEE LIVE 2012 is loaded with new features, all designed to enhance the player’s entertainment experience. New features include:

*New courses - With Golden Tee LIVE 2012 all 30 previously released Golden Tee LIVE courses as well as 5 new courses can be selected for play at any time.
*3 new styles of balls and 3 new sets of clubs
*New spin option - "Bite", allowing the ball to check up instead of spin
*Dozens of crazy new clothing items
*Worldwide Golden Tee Rankings
